ygData.messageBody:
Thanks Cristie and others for the nice words, but I think I know the problem. This is my first (and probably last) mailing list and I didn't realize that they are only for one-shot answers to questions. Does anyone know of a good forum (or whatever they are online) where I could go to for Everquest spell complaints/suggestions? Besides having beta tested for UO, playing Everquest and various info searches, I dont really spend any "social" time online and didnt realize that I was breaking Netiquette rules here.

Thanks
